question: You recently went shopping at the local supermarket. When you got home and noticed your bill, you found that you had been charged for items you did not purchase. Write a letter to the supermarket manager explaining what has happened. Tell the manager you are not able to collect the refund and suggest a refund method and say what do you want him to do
text: I am writing to complain about  an extra charge that was included   in my bill for an item which did not buy from your shop.

The first thing I would like to tell you  is that last weekend I came there  for a grocery. Because of  Canada day the shop was overcrowded. But when I went for a bill to the front desk . The cashier was dealing with many customers at the same time.

When she made a bill for me and another person at the same time.I was a little suspicious when  I was paying because I know my  grocery bill is 60$ every week. But then I thought it is more due to inflation in the market,However when I reached home I noticed that she charged me for a pack of rice which did not buy which caused me a substantial inconvenience as I paid extra for an unwanted thing.

I would greatly appreciate it if you could add this extra money to my next bill because I do not want a money refund. I will return a packet of rice by tomorrow through courier. If you need any assistance you can text me on 96333788827.
I am looking forward to hearing from you.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase However. Consider adding a comma.
